reviewText: I didn't understand a bit of this movie, but it sure is a great showcase for my man Joe Don!!  Stupid movie, but great one of Sallie Field when she was young.

Joe Don Baker kicks ass as Mongo. The great cast includes Telly Savalas, Martin Sheen, Sally Fields and Anne Francis. This violent dark film was actually made for TV and shown on prime television in 1971.

Really nice tv movie, seems like a Kojak episode but this came out before KOJAK existed. Martin Sheen plays Telly's partner. This movie should be included in a Kojak boxset and the title should be changed to KOJAK's BACK in town
